Title: Brewster's Millions
Writer: George Barr McCutcheon (based on the novel by), Herschel Weingrod (screenplay), Timothy Harris (screenplay)
Actors: Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee, Stephen Collins
Plot: A minor league baseball player has to spend $30 million in thirty days, in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity or tell anyone about the deal.
